alert.note: Alert for Meade (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 11:24PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Meade and southwestern Clark Counties through MIDNIGHT CST... At 1124 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Knowles, or 9 miles west of Englewood, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Englewood around 1135 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Acres and Ashland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for southwestern Kansas.
